page.title: 11HAROLD HILL LIBRARY
page.content: This is a branch library and was opened in 1959. Prior to the opening a mobile library served the'Hill'. The Adults Section has approximately 24,372 books while the Childrens Section has 6,605 books. During any one day about 300 adults and 50 children visit the library. The library is open every day of the week except Wednesday and Sunday. Books maybe borrowed for three weeks; a fine of 3p. per day for adults and 1p per day for children is levied when books are overdue. The library has a computer termimal connected to the main Central Library by means of telephone lines.
